long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cyber-Fuchs - Sicher im Netz is a browser extension offering robust online security features. Users log in using a client code and license key, granting access to its protective capabilities. The extension autonomously blocks known malicious domains and conducts real-time checks on searched URLs. If a URL is flagged as malicious, Cyber-Fuchs - Sicher im Netz promptly blocks access, ensuring users navigate safely.
